attributes.action: To take immediate and direct action to protect the interests of one of our own uk citizens abroad, in this case Gillian Gibbons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To take immediate and direct action to protect the interests of one of our own uk citizens abroad, in this case Gillian Gibbons, who has absurdly been jailed and who’s very life is under threat for the naming of a teddy bear.
  This could be any one of our mothers, sisters or friends. Gordon Brown expressing regret is not action and is clearly not good enough.

rejection.details: This petition is no longer relevant.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
